DataElement.preferredName: Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Pain Treatment Referral Administered Average Month Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the number as determined by statistical calculation describing the central tendency in a month for referrals (sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services) for pain from any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Pain Treatment Referral Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the treatment or referral (sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services) for pain from any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.:An unpleasant sensation induced by noxious stimuli and generally received by specialized nerve endings.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: A disorder that affects the masticatory muscles and temporomandibular joint.
The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the number as determined by statistical calculation describing the central tendency in a month.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The central tendency of a set of n numbers; lacking special distinction, rank, or status; commonly encountered.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ReferenceDocuments.name: In the last year, on average,
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the last year, on average, estimate the number of TMJD pain patients you have referred per month

DataElement.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form
